channel.title: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!
channel.description: I HAVE SERVER RUNNING ON 0.0.0.0 BUT I WANT IT TO BE A NO-IP AND ON SERVER STATUS LIST SO OTHER PEOPLE CAN JOIN! I MADE A NO-IP.. WHAT DO I DO NOW? I TRIED LOGGING ONTO THE IP (TRIPLE.NO-IP.INFO) BUT IT SAYS ITS DOWN..

item.title: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

You can’t log into your own server using your WAN address, you must use your LAN address, or 0.0.0.0 or localhost.

(WAN address = Global IP)

Read full topic
item.source: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!

Well when creating the No-IP you must input your IP (not 0.0.0.0)

item.title: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!
item.dc:creator: @Runescape2007x Runescape2007x
item.description:
@Runescape2007x wrote:

OK IT SAYS THE I.P BUT HOW DO I MAKE IT WORK NOW… I TRIED LOGGING ONTO IT AND IT SAYS SERVER DOWN! PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic
item.source: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!

item.title: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

Ok well 0.0.0.0 is just a loop back address to your computer.

Your ip can be found here www.myipaddress.com or go into ms-dos and type ipconfig.

When you have that use it with your No-IP address.

If you have a router setup then you will need to configure it so that the server can run properly, there are many tutorials of how to do this.

Good luck & i hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok if you help me with this you can have co-owner!
